name: Wrong Way!
description:
Just a simple game in which you're forever driving down a busy highway....while going backwards. By using your rear-view mirror, try to dodge cars and stay on the road to reach a new highscore. Hope you enjoy the game, it's my first ever fully completed project and I'm quite happy with it. 

(Submitted to MashUp Game Jam 2)

*Note* Audio slider was working in unity but when I uploaded it, it stopped working. Sorry but I don't have time to figure it out :(
